titleStmt.title: Israea agchithanes, Deaths alarum, or, The presage of approaching death given in a funeral sermon, preached at St. Peters in Norwich, September 30, 1656, for the Right Reverend Joseph Hall, D.D. late Bishop of Norwich, who upon the 8 day of Septem. 1656, Anno ætatis suæ 82. was gathered to the spirits of the just that are made perfect / by John Whitefoote ...
titleStmt.author: Whitefoote, John, 1610-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Godbid, for Edward Dod ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
